title: 2Vast Vista SP1 x64 Beta2
description:
This is my second Beta release. Please respond to bugs and difficulties!

2Vast Vista SP1 x64 Beta2 by Ekner.
No UAC.
Very, very fast and light weight, for every day use.
Takes up less than 5gb of HDD.
Fits on to 2 CD-r 700mb.
30-day trial, lots of cracks available.
Auto user creation - no Admin password.

Language: English (US)
Default keyboard language: English (US)
Time: GMT England, Greenwich.
 

Recommendations:
1,5ghz cpu
1gb ram
6gb hdd

Please comment if you can run this OS on a machine worse than my recommendations.
Please comment if you find any difficulties and/or bugs in this release.
I have only a 70-100kbit upload, so be patient and PLEASE SEED.


Lots of stuff removed, such as:
Speech support
Windows Sidebar
Welcome Center
Network and Sharing Center
Lots of unneccessary drivers
Games
Media Center
Windows Media Player
Movie and DVD Maker
Music, Video and Picture samples
Screensavers and Wallpapers
Windows Sounds
Remote Assistance
Windows Mail
Security center
Tablet PC Support
Windows Performance Index (SAT)
Parental Control
Natural Language
Manual install (Boot from cd works)
Help
